query:
SELECT 
  employeeId, 
  employeeName, 
  COUNT(*) as invoiceCount, 
  SUM(CAST(total AS DECIMAL(12,2))) as totalRevenue
FROM posInvoices 
WHERE status = 'completed' 
  AND invoiceDate >= '2026-02-01' 
  AND invoiceDate <= '2026-02-28'
GROUP BY employeeId, employeeName
ORDER BY totalRevenue DESC
LIMIT 10;
